SELECT
COUNT(1) as count, ccbs.`name`, ccbs.order_num, IFNULL(SUM(ccb.money),0) as money, ccb.type_id, ccbs.status_id
IFNULL(SUM(ccb.money),0) as money, IFNULL(SUM(case when ccb.is_end='1' then ccb.money else 0 end),0) as win, IFNULL(SUM(case when ccb.is_end='2' then ccb.money else 0 end),0) as lose
FROM wk_crm_business as ccb LEFT JOIN wk_crm_business_status as ccbs ON ccbs.status_id = ccb.status_id and ccb.status = 1 where ccbs.type_id = #{typeId}
and ccb.is_end = 0
and ccb.owner_user_id in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,#{sqlDateFormat}) between #{beginTime} and #{finalTime} GROUP BY ccbs.`name`,ccbs.order_num,ccb.type_id order by ccbs.order_num

select #{time.beginTime} as type, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(${data.month}),0) FROM wk_crm_achievement WHERE year = #{data.year} and status=#{data.label} and
type=2 and obj_id in
#{id}
type=3 and obj_id in
#{id}
) as achievement, IFNULL(SUM(money),0) as money FROM
wk_crm_contract
wk_crm_receivables
wk_crm_receivables
where check_status='1' and DATE_FORMAT(
order_date
return_time
return_time
,#{time.sqlDateFormat}) =#{time.beginTime} AND owner_user_id in
#{id}

SELECT activity_type as crmType,COUNT(activity_type) as count FROM wk_crm_activity WHERE type in (1,4) and create_user_id in
#{id}
and status = 1
AND TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(now())
AND to_days(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_time) = 1
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) -1
AND date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')
AND date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m')
AND QUARTER(create_time)=QUARTER(now())
AND QUARTER(create_time)=QUARTER(DATE_SUB(now(),interval 1 QUARTER))
AND YEAR(create_time)=YEAR(NOW())
AND YEAR(create_time)=YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year))
AND TO_DAYS(create_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{data.startTime}) and TO_DAYS(create_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{data.endTime})
group by activity_type
